activities:
Information Collection and Use: When requesting information online from VERSE, commenting on our blog or completing any registration form or other record on our website, we may collect personal information from you such as your name, company name, e-mail address, mailing address, and phone number.

In the case of your use of VERSE Cloud Services once you have entered into an agreement with VERSE to become a VERSE Cloud Services customer (“Client”), the information and data you upload to the VERSE Cloud Services will be used solely in connection with providing to you the products and services you have engaged VERSE to provide pursuant to such agreement. However, we may also use or access such personal or other customer information in connection with preventing or addressing service or technical problems, at a customer’s request in connection with technical support matters, or as may be required by law.

Public Forums: Our website offers publicly accessible blogs. You should be aware that any information you provide in these areas may be read, collected, and used by other blog users. To request removal of your personal information from our blog or community forum, contact us at webmaster@versesolutions.com. In some cases, we may not be able to remove your personal information, in which case we will let you know if we are unable to do so and why.

Customer Testimonials: From time to time, we post customer testimonials on our website which may contain personal information. We will obtain the customer's consent via e-mail prior to posting any testimonial containing a customer’s name or other personal information. If you wish to update or delete your testimonial, you can contact us at webmaster@versesolutions.com.

Social Media Features: Our website includes Social Media Features, such as the Facebook Like button and Widgets, such as the Share This button or interactive mini-programs that run on our site. These Features may collect your IP address, which page you are visiting on our site, and may set a cookie to enable the Feature to function properly. Social Media Features and Widgets are either hosted by a third party or hosted directly on our Site. Your interactions with these Features are governed by the privacy policy of the company providing it.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data collected directly on the Internet, offline data and manually processed data.
